item.title: Computer Hacking
item.description: Computer Hacking What is computer hacking? Computer hacking, on one hand, describes the activities practiced by individuals, organizations, and nations, in order to gain unauthorized access to computer and technology dependent systems.

item.title: Cyber Crimes
item.description: Cyber Crimes What is cybercrimes? Cybercrime is any criminal activity that involves a computer ([[nibm_notes/introduction_to_computer_science/computer_crimes/computer_hacking|computer hacking]]), networked device or a network.
